name: DenoRun
author: Maciej Maciejewski
helpMarkDown: Runs Deno script from local file, URL or inline

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script type: Path, URL or Inline

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path or URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path or URL of the script to be executed

inputs.name: script
inputs.label: Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: Script content written in JavaScript or TypesScript

inputs.name: permissions
inputs.label: Permissions
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A list of permissions that are added to the run command, each in separate lines. Ex:

--allow-read
--allow-write=/tmp

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of arguments passed to the Deno script

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory of the Deno script
